reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Since we had to wait for our morning flight to USA we wanted to book a hotel which had an airport shuttle service and was close to the city.
reviews.title: Very nice stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: NH Frankfurt Niederrad met boat conditions.
reviews.title: Very good stay

reviews.text: We did not have to worry about getting to the airport on time and we were close to the city so we had a nice afternoon sightseeing of Frankfurt.
reviews.title: Very comfortable. Good location for airport and Stadium. Staff helpful.

reviews.text: The hotel is modern and clean.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.text: Location is in an industrial/office area close to the city by S-Bahn.
reviews.title: Don't judge a book by its cover...

reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel on both ends of out European excursion. The airport shuttle was very handy. But be sure to book a seat on the shuttle for your return trip to the airport as the shuttle only hsas room for 6 persons. The front desk staff were very nice and spoke excellent English. We did not try the breakfast buffet as it was 19 euros. A bit out of our budget. ;) There is a supermarket right next door which has excellent pastries and sandwiches. It opens at 7 am. The room was a decent size. The televison is an old crt type but serves its purpose. The beds are comfortable and the shower is a nice size. I would not hesitate in recommending this hotel to anyone that wants a short stay. It is about a 10 min walk to the Sbahn which is one stop away from the central train station. But I would suggest going two stops further to the middle of the shopping district. The area around the train station it dodgy.
reviews.title: Nice airport hotel

reviews.text: Good all around hotel considering the rate. Rooms are great except for a bit small and old fashinoned TV. I think that the lobby and breakfast area are quite classy, and with free wifi, there is not much to improve.
reviews.title: Nice business hotel close to airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotels own "gym" was basic and a bit pathetic, but considering nightly rate it is not a big deal. It is easy to reach downtown or airport, so in that sense it is in central location. The river Elbe is quite close, offering nice walking routes.
reviews.title: Excellent reception service

reviews.text: We stayed here before our flight out to the States the next day. Svenja @ the reception staff was extremely helpful and personable. She assisted us in printing our boarding passes which was very much appreciated. Nice, functional and clean room, we walked to one of the few nearby restaurants for dinner. As others have pointed out, this is more of a business area. We caught their shuttle service at the airport after arriving at the train station @ terminal 2, then just walked over to terminal 1 where all the airport shuttles stop. Note: we couldn't find the phone to call for pickup @ terminal 1, so that's why we just went to the terminal 1 main stop.
reviews.title: Good business hotel in a business area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Also signed up for shuttle service the next morning to airport. It operated exactly on time, so don't delay getting to the lobby area promptly.
reviews.title: Interesting Feature for Airport Layover

reviews.text: Stayed there for a week, the only thing I enjoyed is the buffet breakfast.
reviews.title: Not as good as I expected

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I read the reviews before my trip but was a little disappointed about the following:
reviews.title: Excellent for a stopover

reviews.text: - no bath tube in the bathroom
reviews.title: Perfect For Passing Through

reviews.text: - an outdated CRT TV - it turned itself off after several minutes from the second day for unknown reason, I did not bother to ask for repair as there are not many channels in English anyway
reviews.title: A good value for money if the price is right

reviews.text: - free Wifi access is only available in the lobby
reviews.title: Nice hotel that splits the distance to the airport and city center

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed at NH Frankfurt Niederrad overnight. Our flight landed at 8:00 pm, and we easily located the shuttle pick-up location on arrivals level, right outside the baggage hall. After calling the hotel, the shuttle picked us up within 15 minutes. Upon arrival, we were quickly and efficiently checked in (the front desk lady was very quick, but a little cold). Our room was on the fifth floor, and very nice and modern. The bathroom only had a shower, but it was HUGE. We didn't eat at the hotel due to the cost, however, there are several supermarkets in the area. We went to the one next door to grab snacks for the night and to grab breakfast for the morning.
reviews.title: Great lay-over hotel

likes.liked: — Very modern, close to the airport
likes.disliked: — In a business district, not much to see.

reviews.title: 4 star
reviews.text: We received a very friendly wake-up call, and were able to catch the complimentary shuttle (which runs every half hour). The ride to the airport was quick, although they drop you off at arrivals, rather than on the departures level.

reviews.title: OK!
reviews.text: Overall, a very nice hotel for an overnight trip!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed one night before flying out of Frankfurt. Booked the hotel on Expedia for $70 a night including taxes. 4-star business class hotel with free internet in the lobby. Big room with fantastic bed. TV had movies in English along with CNN and BBC news. Nice bathroom. Easy, free shuttle to and from airport runs every 30 minutes. Dinner was very pricey so decided to eat at an Italian place about 200 yds away and had a fantastic meal. Breakfast in incredible, but be prepared to pay 18 Euro per person if not included in room price. No place better to stay before or after flights from Frankfurt. 1/3 the price of the airport Sheraton.
reviews.title: Excellent stopover hotel

likes.liked: — Room comfort and convenience to airport.

reviews.text: I was put up by Lufthansa here on a 1 night stop when the plane was delayed (well, about 5 hours actually)
reviews.title: very nice hotel, but a little out of the way
